Name: nameColumnRendered
Description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the name column, when set to false name column will not be rendered.

Name: sizeColumnRendered
Description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the size column, when set to false size column will not be rendered.

Name: typeColumnRendered
Description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the type column, when set to false type column will not be rendered.

Name: functionColumnRendered
Description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the function column, when set to false function column will not be rendered.

Name: previewRendered
Description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the preview icon, when set to false preview icon will not be rendered.

Name: uploadRendered
Description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the upload icon, when set to false upload icon will not be rendered.

Name: downloadRendered
Description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the download icon, when set to false download icon will not be rendered.

Name: deleteRendered
Description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the delete icon, when set to false delete icon will not be rendered.

Name: renameRendered
Description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the edit filename icon, when set to false the icon will not be rendered.

Name: messageRendered
Description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the message, when set to false message will not be rendered.

Name: renderChooseUploadIcon
Description: Defines if the button to upload document is displayed or not.

Name: lazy
Description: Boolean value to specify whether the table should load data lazily and enable pagination.

Name: fileLimit
Description: Maximum number of files that can be uploaded.

Name: sizeLimit
Description: Maximum size of an individual file in bytes.

Name: uploadText
Description: Label text displayed on the upload button.

Name: updatedComponentAfterUploaded
Description: Space-separated clientIds (or EL expressions) of components to update after a successful upload. Example: 'document-table document-messages'.

Name: previewTitle
Description: Tooltip text displayed when hovering over the preview icon.

Name: previewIcon
Description: Icon class for the preview link.

Name: previewStyleClass
Description: Custom CSS style class to apply to the preview link.

Name: previewDialogStyleClass
Description: Custom CSS style class to apply to the preview dialog.

Name: previewPDFStyleClass
Description: Custom CSS style class to apply to PDF preview media element.

Name: previewImageStyleClass
Description: Custom CSS style class to apply to image preview element.

Name: downloadTitle
Description: Tooltip text displayed when hovering over the download icon.

Name: downloadIcon
Description: Icon class will be displayed in download link.

Name: downloadStyleClass
Description: Styles for download link.

Name: deleteTitle
Description: Tooltip text displayed when hovering over the delete icon.

Name: deleteIcon
Description: Icon class will be displayed in delete link.

Name: deleteStyleClass
Description: Custom CSS style class to apply to the download link.

Name: updatedComponentAfterDeleted
Description: Space-separated clientIds (or EL expressions) of components to update after a successful deletion. Example: 'document-table document-messages'.

Name: renameText
Description: Tooltip text displayed when hovering over the rename icon.

Name: renameTitle
Description: Title text displayed in the rename dialog header.

Name: renameStyleClass
Description: Custom CSS style class to apply to the rename link.

Name: updatedComponentAfterRenamed
Description: Space-separated clientIds (or EL expressions) of components to update after a successful rename. Example: 'document-table document-messages'.

Name: selectedType
Description: Default document type to be selected. If not provided, the first item of ``typeSelectionItems`` will be used.

Name: typeSelectionItems
Description: Array of DocumentType objects for the type selection dropdown. Default is #{documentUploadBean.documentTypes} which returns BasicDocumentType enum values (DOCUMENTATION, CONTRACT, INFORMATION, EMAIL, OTHERS).

Name: enableScriptCheckingForUploadedDocument
Description:
| Boolean value to specify script checking. Set to ``true`` to enable script checking.
| The setting will detect Portal setting ``Portal.Document.EnableScriptChecking`` as its default value, refer to :ref:`update-portal-settings` for more details.
| If the Portal setting is not available, defaults to ``false``.

Name: enableVirusScannerForUploadedDocument
Description:
| Boolean value to specify virus scanning. Set to ``true`` to enable virus scanning. Refer to :ref:`Virus Scanning Setting<settings-virus-scanning-setting>` for more details.
| The setting will detect Portal setting ``Portal.Document.EnableVirusScanner`` as its default value, refer to :ref:`update-portal-settings` for more details.
| If Portal setting is not available, default value is ``false``.

Name: allowedUploadFileTypes
Description:
| String value to specify the list of file extension that can be uploaded.
| The setting will detect Portal setting ``Portal.Document.WhitelistExtension`` as its default value, refer to :ref:`update-portal-settings` for more details.
| If Portal setting is not available, default value is ``doc,docx,xls,xlsx,xlsm,csv,pdf,ppt,pptx,txt,zip,jpg,jpeg,bmp,png``.
